last_episode_to_air.name: Retro Orgy Night
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's party night on Dave's Old Porn when guests Andy Dick, reality star/model Adrianne Curry, porn stars Sean Michaels, Kayden Kross and 2013 AVN Awards co-hosts Jesse Jane and Asa Akira join Dave on the couch for an orgy of some of his favorite clips from the Golden Age of Porn.

name: Dave's Old Porn
overview: Dave's Old Porn was a comedy show starring Dave Attell that premiered on Showtime on October 20, 2011. Attell has described the series as "the Mystery Science Theater of porn." Through the show's Twitter account, Attell revealed Showtime passed on a third season, and that he intends to continue the show in a smaller form through the website.

episodes.name: Whitney Cummings, Ron Jeremy
episodes.overview: Whitney Cummings, Ron Jeremy. Whitney Cummings (NBC's Whitney, Comedy Central Roasts) joins Dave Attell to do the unthinkable--watch an entire adult movie--Bad Girls (1981) starring Ron Jeremy. Dave then welcomes porn legend Ron Jeremy as they look back on the sequels to Bad Girls, and many more classic Ron Jeremy moments.

episodes.name: Chelsea Handler, The Sklar Brothers
episodes.overview: Chelsea Handler, The Sklar Brothers. Dave introduces Chelsea Handler (Chelsea Lately) to the bizarre world of vintage fetish movies as they explore the boundaries of what can be legally shown on television. And twin brother comedians Jason and Randy Sklar (Sklarbro Country podcast) and Dave watch the ultimate fetish movie Teenage Twins (1976), starring real identical twins Brooke and Taylor Young.

episodes.name: Belladonna, Bobbi Starr, and Kristina Rose
episodes.overview: Belladonna, Bobbi Starr, and Kristina Rose. Dave Attell shows three of today's hottest porn stars scenes from the retro adult movies of the 1970's. Adult video stars Belladonna, Bobbi Starr, and Kristina Rose take a crash course in the adult classics of yesteryear, as Dave shows them erotica from a simpler, and much hairier, time.

episodes.name: Bill Burr, Nina Hartley
episodes.overview: Bill Burr, Nina Hartley. Dave and comedian Bill Burr (The Monday Morning Podcast) celebrate the adult movies of one of the biggest porn stars of all time, Nina Hartley (Boogie Nights). Dave and Bill first take us through Nina's classic movie The Ultimate Lover (1986), then they welcome Nina as they review Nina's acclaimed adult career.

episodes.name: Adam Carolla, Georgina Spelvin
episodes.overview: Adam Carolla, Georgina Spelvin. Dave and Adam Carolla (The Adam Carolla Show podcast) pay tribute to the godmother of porn, Georgina Spelvin, the star of the groundbreaking adult film The Devil in Miss Jones (1973). Dave and Adam are then joined by Miss Jones herself, 75-year-old Georgina Spelvin, as they look back on her legendary body of work.

episodes.name: Jim Norton, Seka
episodes.overview: Dave Attell and fellow comedian and porn aficionado Jim Norton (The Opie and Anthony Show) salute the work of Seka, the goddess of classic adult cinema. Dave and Jim then meet Seka, and together they watch Seka's most legendary scenes as she teaches them the tricks of the trade.

episodes.name: Margaret Cho, Paul Thomas
episodes.overview: Actress and comedian Margaret Cho (Drop Dead Diva) joins Dave Attell to honor one of the most prolific names in adult movies, actor and director Paul Thomas. And Dave and Margaret welcome AVN Hall of Fame member Paul Thomas as they see what made Paul one of adult cinema's most sought-after performers.

episodes.name: Greg Fitzsimmons, Sharon Kane
episodes.overview: Dave and comedian Greg Fitzsimmons (Fitzdog Radio) celebrate the adult film career of actress and director Sharon Kane (AVN Hall of Fame). And Sharon joins Dave and Greg as they look back on classic Sharon movies from the 70's and 80's.

episodes.name: Kathy Griffin, Tom Byron
episodes.overview: It's a star-studded night on Dave's Old Porn as Emmy-winning comedienne Kathy Griffin joins Dave to pay tribute to Tom Byron - the prince of retro porn! It's a free-for-all of laughs and raunchy clips as they celebrate Tom's 30 years in the biz.

episodes.name: Joe Rogan, Ginger Lynn
episodes.overview: It's a magical time on Dave's Old Porn when Dave and fellow comic Joe Rogan (UFC commentator, The Joe Rogan Experience podcast, Fear Factor) get to meet their dream girl from the '80s -- the one and only Ginger Lynn. Ginger takes the boys through some of her hottest clips including her first adult film ever -- Surrender in Paradise!

episodes.name: Amy Schumer, Robert Kerman
episodes.overview: With the help of Amy Schumer, Dave takes a look at one of the greatest adult films of all time -- Debbie Does Dallas. Special guest: AVN Hall of Fame actor Robert Kerman.

episodes.name: Artie Lange, Vanessa Del Rio
episodes.overview: Artie Lange doesn't hold back when he joins Dave to celebrate the first Latina porn star of all time -- the great Vanessa Del Rio. And it only gets hotter when Vanessa herself takes them through her some of her sauciest retro clips!

episodes.name: Rob Zombie, Judah Friedlander & Joanna Angel
episodes.overview: It's HORROR night on Dave's Old Porn!!! Yesâ€¦hairy meets scary when Dave and guests Rob Zombie (House of 1000 Corpses, Halloween), Judah Friedlander (30 Rock, Feast) and adult star Joanna Angel take a look some sexy, scary films from the '70s and '80s.

episodes.name: Lisa Lampanelli, Herschel Savage & Ron Jeremy
episodes.overview: Queen of Mean Lisa Lampanelli (Celebrity Apprentice) joins Dave as he honors Jewish men in porn with a tribute to the legendary Herschel Savage. The show really heats up when porn legend Ron Jeremy drops by to give a play-by-play of Expose Me Now, a raunchy gem starring Herschel and Ron.

episodes.name: Marc Maron, Christy Canyon
episodes.overview: Dave invites old friend and fellow comic Marc Maron (creator and host of WTF podcast) onto the couch to pay tribute to one of the hottest babes from the '80s and every guy's fantasy - the legendary Christy Canyon.
